title: Surreal in Chicago
content:
Designers, here's the place to go when visiting O'Hare (O'Hell in my experience) airport in Chicago: a trashy little deli/bar in one of the terminals named "CHICAGO salutes THE GRAPHIC ARTS". The form of the salute? A cheesy mural on one wall. Maybe they should rename it "CHICAGO salutes NON-STANDARD CAPITALIZATION" or "CHICAGO salutes SIGNS SET IN HELVETICA".

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713185747im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chicago_6452.jpg)
author: londontype

comments.content: But have you tried their pizza?
The C and A in CHICAGO need to be kerned a little tighter.

Wow...that is...umm...just really weird.

I wonder if the Chicago AIGA will adopt a bronze hot dog as their award statue for the design shows?
